text: Hello guys, could somebody help me with setting Unicode math? I use doom, and at the moment I use company with company-Unicode backend. It works ok, but many symbols are not there (for instance, \bfA,...)

elements.text: Hello guys, could somebody help me with setting Unicode math? I use doom, and at the moment I use company with company-Unicode backend. It works ok, but many symbols are not there (for instance, \bfA,...)

text:
hm, so I'm able to use \bfA using doom. I believe it is the julia-lsp-server which allows for that. this may come with more things than you're necessarily looking for, but my setup for it is
```(after! julia-repl
  (setq juliaVersion "1.6.0"))
(use-package! lsp-julia
  :after julia-repl eshell
  :config
  (setenv "PATH"
          (concat
           "~/julia-" juliaVersion "/bin" ":"
           (getenv "PATH")))
  (add-hook 'julia-mode-hook 'lsp)
  (add-hook 'ess-julia-mode-hook #'lsp)
  (setq lsp-julia-default-environment "~/.julia/environments/v1.5")

  (setq lsp-julia-timeout 12000)
  (setq lsp-enable-folding t)
  (setq julia-indent-offset 4)
  )
(setq julia-indent-offset 4)```

elements.text: hm, so I'm able to use \bfA using doom. I believe it is the julia-lsp-server which allows for that. this may come with more things than you're necessarily looking for, but my setup for it is

(after! julia-repl
  (setq juliaVersion "1.6.0"))
(use-package! lsp-julia
  :after julia-repl eshell
  :config
  (setenv "PATH"
          (concat
           "~/julia-" juliaVersion "/bin" ":"
           (getenv "PATH")))
  (add-hook 'julia-mode-hook 'lsp)
  (add-hook 'ess-julia-mode-hook #'lsp)
  (setq lsp-julia-default-environment "~/.julia/environments/v1.5")

  (setq lsp-julia-timeout 12000)
  (setq lsp-enable-folding t)
  (setq julia-indent-offset 4)
  )
(setq julia-indent-offset 4)
